content.rendered:
Directed by Mohit Suri.

Written by Tushar Hiranandani. Ishita Moitra.

Cast Shraddha Kapoor(Riya Somani). Arjun Kapoor(Madhav Jha). Vikrant Massey(Shailesh Kumar Pandey). Shriidhar Dubey(Hemant (as Shreedhar Dubey)). Dalip Sondhi(Mr. Somani). Rhea Chakraborty(Anshika).Adam Davenport. Ella Ayberk(UN delegate). Carishma Basday(rock singer). Seema Biswas(Madhav’s Mother). Anisa Butt(Rutvi). Aaron Latta-Morissette(Performers’ Enthusiast). Paula McGlynn(Samantha). Akash Makhija(Raman yadav). Hugo Salazar Jr.(Dancer / Acrobat). Aidan Ayberk(Kosta Smirnoff). Omkar Vishwakarma(Omkar). Umair Patel(Musical Artist (archive sound)). Pravin Singh Sisodia(MLA Ojha). Sushant Sharma(Ashu). Tvisha Shah(Tvisha). Kingsheharyarmirza(Musicial airtist (archive sound)). Scott Milburn(Basketball Player). Vikas Mandaliya(Rohan Chandak). Daniel Tortorelli(Flag waiver in parade scene). Keegan van Zyl(Bar Man)

Language Hindi.

Producers Aleem Allie. Nizam Allie. Siddharth Atha. Mehboob Bawa. Chetan Bhagat. Richard de Varda. Noorie Hassan. Ekta Kapoor. Shobha Kapoor. Kingsheharyarmirza. Rashmi Kulkarni. Sameer Nair. Sanjay Paraswani. Sumit Sabharwal. Prashant Shah. Suraj Singh. Mohit Suri.

Production ALT Entertainment. Balaji Motion Pictures.
